original_text: Then he brought me back to the door of the temple, and behold, water was issuing from below the threshold of the temple toward the east (for the temple faced east). The water was flowing down from below the south end of the threshold of the temple, south of the altar.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 성전 문에 이르시니 성전의 앞면이 동쪽을 향하였는데 그 문지방 밑에서 물이 나와 동쪽으로 흐르다가 성전 오른쪽 제단 남쪽으로 흘러 내리더라

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me back to the door of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 성전 문으로 다시 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: water was issuing from below the threshold of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 물이 성전 문지방 아래에서 솟아나오고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The water was flowing down from below the south end of the threshold of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물은 성전 문지방 남쪽 끝 아래에서 흘러내리고 있었습니다
